original_title: アブノーマル・ロデオ・ブルース
overview: One day, two bodies were found in a factory. Although there were gunshot wounds, the cause of death was determined to be asphyxiation. One was Hideo Goto, who was on the verge of his breakthrough as a unique actor in his twenties. The other was Kouji Kawamura, who was also a DJ in his teens. Kawamura was once involved in an incident and was imprisoned. He is now working at the company of his childhood friend, Hideo Goto. What really happened between them?  Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
title: Abnormal Rodeo Blues
